recipesJson.name: Batter Up
recipesJson.author: NotCharlesManson
recipesJson.description: Blueberry muffin batter. Age at least 3 days. If you want it a little more complex, try adding either .2% FA Walnut, 1% CAP Vanilla Custard v1, or .25% FA Torrone.

reviews.text: I am loving this recipe! Mixed this up yesterday exactly as written. It smelled so good I had to have a taste and I've been vaping it since last night. Great job!
This is amazing! Another banger from NCM! Proves that you don't need 8 flavors to get complexity. 5 Stars!

Simple yet satisfying, the combination of cake batter and nonna's cake give it complexity and the hint of lemon really brightens up the blueberry which is one of my favorite flavorings of all time this one is definitely going into my all day vape rotation
